item.title: CVE-2024-1474|2024-02-21T15:33:20.265Z -- Progress Software Coproration -- WS_FTP Server
item.description: In WS_FTP Server versions before 8.8.5, reflected cross-site scripting issues have been identified on various user supplied inputs on the WS_FTP Server administrative interface.
